page.title: 17Atmosphere
page.content: She said it was a nice and friendly place and that it is comfortable. She said that there should be more clubs in Blockley. She works in Blockley and she said that generally the services in Blockley were fairly good but because the village has a large number of people that only use houses at weekends the need for services is getting smaller. The bus service in Blockley is not as good as it used to be and this is probabley because fewer people live all the time in Blockley and therefore don't need the service.
